InteractFunc module

InteractFunc.AddElementToHistory(PathToWorkingDir, ProjectName) → bool[source]

Add a line to the history.txt file when creating a new file.

Parameters

  • PathToWorkingDir (str) – Path to the main directory where the history file is located.

  • ProjectName (str) – Name of the project that will be created

Returns

True if the line could be added, false if not.

Return type

bool

InteractFunc.CopyTeX(WorkingDir, FileName, FolderName, PathToSource)[source]

Copies a file.

Parameters

  • WorkingDir (str) – Target directory

  • FileName (str) – the file name (with extension) that needs to be copied

  • FolderName (str) – Target folder (inside :param:`WorkingDir`)

  • PathToSource (str) – Path to LaTeX source files

InteractFunc.CreateHistory(PathToWorkingDir) → bool[source]

Initializes the history.txt file in a new directory.

Parameters

PathToWorkingDir (str) – Path to the target directory.

Returns

True if the file was created, false if not.

Return type

bool

InteractFunc.CreateLocalSettings(PathToWorkingDir, ProjectName)[source]

Creates a local_settings.json file - This feature has no use for now.

Parameters

  • PathToWorkingDir (str) – Path to the main directory

  • ProjectName (str) – Name of the project where the file should be located

Returns

True if the file could be created, false if not.

Return type

bool

InteractFunc.MakeChangeToJSON(PathToFile, TargetField, elem)[source]

Makes changes to a simple field in a JSON file. The file must already exist.

Parameters

  • PathToFile (str) – Path to the target file.

  • TargetField (str) – The field that will be modified.

  • elem (str) – The element that will modify the TargetField JSON field.

InteractFunc.MakeFolder(WorkingDir, FolderName)[source]

Creates a folder in the specified directory.

Parameters

  • WorkingDir (str) – The target directory where the new folder should be created

  • FolderName (str) – Name of the new folder

InteractFunc.RegisterDeletion(PathToWorkingDir, ProjectName) → bool[source]

Takes note of the deletion of a project in history.txt.

Parameters

  • PathToWorkingDir (str) – Path to the main directory where the history file is located.

  • ProjectName (str) – Name of the project that will be deleted

Returns

True if the line could be added, false if not.

Return type

bool

InteractFunc.SearchTeX(SearchWord, FileName) → bool[source]

Checks if a word is inside a text file or not.

Parameters

  • SearchWord (str) – The target word

  • FileName (str) – Path to the file where the word should be.

Returns

True if the word is in the file, false if not.

Return type

bool

Add a new element to a JSON file

Parameters

  • PathToFile (str) – Path to the JSON file

  • elem (dict) – Complex element that needs to be added.
